summary: After being cast in the hit teen sitcom Salvados por la campana (1989), six unknown young actors must deal with the Hollywood spotlight and the challenges of growing up under public scrutiny.
cast: Sam Kindseth|Dylan Everett|Alyssa Lynch|Tiera Skovbye|Taylor Russell|Julian Works|Andrew Moxham|Kendall Cross|Ken Tremblett|Manny Jacinto|Sean Campbell|Adam Greydon Reid|Andrew Herr|Alannah Berry|Kevin O'Grady|Françoise Yip|Elfina Luk|Christine Bortolin|Peter DeLuise|Aaron Craven|Alison Raine|Alistair Abell|Devina Briggs|Nicholas Elia|Rhys Matthew Bond|Larissa Dias|Kayla Deorksen|Isis Wright|Laine MacNeil|Louriza Tronco|Chris Cope|Grayson Maxwell Gurnsey|Jordyn Ashley Olson|Eric Gibson|Lisa C. Ravensbergen|Corey Woods|Jinjara Mitchell|Julia Vodarek|Paul Lazenby|France Perras|Martin Mercier|Carolyn Adair|Bryson Bourchier|Anthony Ray|Tom MacNeill
title: Salvados por la campana: Detrás de las cámaras
